thread.section_title: The Pearl Source Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Pearl Source | www.thepearlsource.com
thread.title: Antonio
thread.title_full: The Pearl Source reviewed by Antonio

author: Antonio
title: Antonio
text: After being underwhelmed by pearls I ordered from elsewhere, I stumbled across The Pearl Source. They had a great range and I was able to find better pearls and better designed earrings at amazing prices. I opened the box today, a week after ordering - postage to Australia, and was blown away by the quality. If I am looking for pearls, I know where I will be looking first from now on. Thanks The Pearl Source!!
